attributes.additional_details:
In order to gain NHS treatment the patient must be a working tax payer and should have been for 3 years.
unless;
The patient is in education, or under the age of 18.

The patient is on benefits but proactively searching for jobs and is applying for 6 jobs a week, minimum and can proove so.

The patient is a pensioner, or disabled.

Otherwise, patients must seek medical attention from a private doctor.

rejection.details: Also, if you want a petition considered for publication you need to meet the criteria - you must include your full first name and full surname.
